plant.name: Lithops
plant.description: Lithops are dwarf, succulent mimicry plants comprising two thick fleshy semi-translucent leaves resembling stones. The flattened top part of the leaf is window-like. The upper surface of the plants are of a varied and translucent nature: some have speckled lines, are grooved, or even spotted. Lithops plants come in a variety of patterns and colors.
